verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they bring <WH3947> me an offering <WH8641>: of every man <WH376> that giveth it willingly <WH5068> with his heart <WH3820> ye shall take <WH3947> my offering <WH8641>. bring me: Heb. take for me offering: or, heave offering
And this is the offering <WH8641> which ye shall take <WH3947> of them; gold <WH2091>, and silver <WH3701>, and brass <WH5178>, offering: or, heave offering
And blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8438> <WH8144>, and fine linen <WH8336>, and goats' <WH5795> hair, fine: or, silk
And rams' <WH352> skins <WH5785> dyed red <WH119>, and badgers' <WH8476> skins <WH5785>, and shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>,
Oil <WH8081> for the light <WH3974>, spices <WH1314> for anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and for sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004>,
Onyx <WH7718> stones <WH68>, and stones <WH68> to be set <WH4394> in the ephod <WH646>, and in the breastplate <WH2833>.
And let them make <WH6213> me a sanctuary <WH4720>; that I may dwell <WH7931> among <WH8432> them.
According to all that I shew <WH7200> thee, after the pattern <WH8403> of the tabernacle <WH4908>, and the pattern <WH8403> of all the instruments <WH3627> thereof, even so shall ye make <WH6213> it.

And they shall make <WH6213> an ark <WH727> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>: two cubits <WH520> and a half <WH2677> shall be the length <WH753> thereof, and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> the breadth <WH7341> thereof, and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> the height <WH6967> thereof.

And thou shalt overlay <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>, within <WH1004> and without <WH2351> shalt thou overlay <WH6823> it, and shalt make <WH6213> upon it a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> round about <WH5439>.

And thou shalt cast <WH3332> four <WH702> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091> for it, and put <WH5414> them in the four <WH702> corners <WH6471> thereof; and two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> shall be in the one <WH259> side <WH6763> of it, and two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> in the other <WH8145> side of it.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>, and overlay <WH6823> them with gold <WH2091>.
And thou shalt put <WH935> the staves <WH905> into the rings <WH2885> by the sides <WH6763> of the ark <WH727>, that the ark <WH727> may be borne <WH5375> with them.
The staves <WH905> shall be <WH1961> in the rings <WH2885> of the ark <WH727>: they shall not be taken <WH5493> from it.
And thou shalt put <WH5414> into the ark <WH727> the testimony <WH5715> which I shall give <WH5414> thee.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> a mercy seat <WH3727> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>: two cubits <WH520> and a half <WH2677> shall be the length <WH753> thereof, and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> the breadth <WH7341> thereof.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> two <WH8147> cherubims <WH3742> of gold <WH2091>, of beaten work <WH4749> shalt thou make <WH6213> them, in the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the mercy seat <WH3727>.

And make <WH6213> one <WH259> cherub <WH3742> on the one end <WH7098>, and the other <WH259> cherub <WH3742> on the other <WH2088> end <WH7098>: even of the mercy seat <WH3727> shall ye make <WH6213> the cherubims <WH3742> on the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> thereof. of: or, of the matter of the mercy seat

And the cherubims <WH3742> shall stretch <WH6566> forth their wings <WH3671> on high <WH4605>, covering <WH5526> the mercy seat <WH3727> with their wings <WH3671>, and their faces <WH6440> shall look one <WH376> to another <WH251>; toward the mercy seat <WH3727> shall the faces <WH6440> of the cherubims <WH3742> be.
And thou shalt put <WH5414> the mercy seat <WH3727> above <WH4605> upon the ark <WH727>; and in the ark <WH727> thou shalt put <WH5414> the testimony <WH5715> that I shall give <WH5414> thee.

And there I will meet <WH3259> with thee, and I will commune <WH1696> with thee from above the mercy seat <WH3727>, from between <WH996> the two <WH8147> cherubims <WH3742> which are upon <WH5921> the ark <WH727> of the testimony <WH5715>, of all things which I will give thee in commandment <WH6680> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

Thou shalt also make <WH6213> a table <WH7979> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>: two cubits <WH520> shall be the length <WH753> thereof, and a cubit <WH520> the breadth <WH7341> thereof, and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> the height <WH6967> thereof.
And thou shalt overlay <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>, and make <WH6213> thereto a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> round about <WH5439>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> unto it a border <WH4526> of an hand breadth <WH2948> round about <WH5439>, and thou shalt make <WH6213> a golden <WH2091> crown <WH2213> to the border <WH4526> thereof round about <WH5439>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> for it four <WH702> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091>, and put <WH5414> the rings <WH2885> in the four <WH702> corners <WH6285> that are on the four <WH702> feet <WH7272> thereof.
Over against <WH5980> the border <WH4526> shall the rings <WH2885> be for places <WH1004> of the staves <WH905> to bear <WH5375> the table <WH7979>.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> the staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>, and overlay <WH6823> them with gold <WH2091>, that the table <WH7979> may be borne <WH5375> with them.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> the dishes <WH7086> thereof, and spoons <WH3709> thereof, and covers <WH7184> thereof, and bowls <WH4518> thereof, to cover <WH5258> withal <WH2004>: of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091> shalt thou make <WH6213> them. to: or, to pour out withal
And thou shalt set <WH5414> upon the table <WH7979> shewbread <WH3899> before <WH6440> me alway <WH8548>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> a candlestick <WH4501> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>: of beaten work <WH4749> shall the candlestick <WH4501> be made <WH6213>: his shaft <WH3409>, and his branches <WH7070>, his bowls <WH1375>, his knops <WH3730>, and his flowers <WH6525>, shall be of the same.

And six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> shall come <WH3318> out of the sides <WH6654> of it; three <WH7969> branches <WH7070> of the candlestick <WH4501> out of the one <WH259> side <WH6654>, and three <WH7969> branches <WH7070> of the candlestick <WH4501> out of the other <WH8145> side <WH6654>:

Three <WH7969> bowls <WH1375> made like unto almonds <WH8246>, with a knop <WH3730> and a flower <WH6525> in one <WH259> branch <WH7070>; and three <WH7969> bowls <WH1375> made like almonds <WH8246> in the other <WH259> branch <WH7070>, with a knop <WH3730> and a flower <WH6525>: so in the six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> that come <WH3318> out of the candlestick <WH4501>.
And in the candlestick <WH4501> shall be four <WH702> bowls <WH1375> made like unto almonds <WH8246>, with their knops <WH3730> and their flowers <WH6525>.

And there shall be a knop <WH3730> under two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of the same, and a knop <WH3730> under two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of the same, and a knop <WH3730> under two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of the same, according to the six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> that proceed <WH3318> out of the candlestick <WH4501>.
Their knops <WH3730> and their branches <WH7070> shall be of the same: all it shall be one <WH259> beaten work <WH4749> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> the seven <WH7651> lamps <WH5216> thereof: and they shall light <WH5927> the lamps <WH5216> thereof, that they may give light <WH215> over against <WH5676> it <WH6440>. shall light: or, shall cause to ascend it: Heb. the face of it
And the tongs <WH4457> thereof, and the snuffdishes <WH4289> thereof, shall be of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>.
Of a talent <WH3603> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091> shall he make <WH6213> it, with all these vessels <WH3627>.
And look <WH7200> that thou make <WH6213> them after their pattern <WH8403>, which was shewed <WH7200> thee in the mount <WH2022>. which: Heb. which thou wast caused to see
